data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Faridpur unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Faridpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Faridpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Faridpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Faridpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kapali people. Make the Kapali people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, let those from the 2,396 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Faridpur. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.section_summary:
the county of Faridpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh has a population of 1,913,000.

We estimate Faridpur has 2,396 people who might know Jesus, 5,739 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,904,865 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,396 believers in Faridpur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
